item.title: 0303. Range Sum Query - Immutable
item.description: Solutions # Brute Force & Memorial # 本来题主以为这里考的是使用记忆化数组来避免重复计算，结果一提交结果，发现自己还是太天真了… type NumArray struct { nums []int dict map[string]int } func Constructor(nums []int) NumArray { return NumArray{nums, make(map[string]int)} } func (this *NumArray) SumRange(left int, right int) int { if left == right { return (*this).nums[left] } if left > right { return 0 } target := string(left) + string(right) if _, ok := (*this).dict[target]; ok { return (*this).dict[target] } res := this.nums[left] + this.
